## NodeCanvas class

A limited Node implementation for DOM HTMLCanvasElement.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NodeCanvas extends NodeImageBitmapConsumer implements ICanvas 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvas.height.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The height of the canvas. |
|  [width](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvas.width.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The width of the canvas. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getContext(context, options)](./canvas-cleave.nodecanvas.getcontext.md) |  | Get a 2D rendering context for the canvas. |
